description.freelance: Passionate about web technologies, I assure a constant follow up about latest trend and technologies to insure a complete accompaniment for your project.
description.home: My name is Sebastien and I am a software engineer from France. Currently working as a full-stack javascript/python, I share my time between freelancing and personal projects.
description.legal: This website is edited as individual and private content. It is not attached to any company of any kind.
description.projects: Seven23 is a personal budget application for nomads, but not only. MPDBox is a NFC music reader using a raspberry Pi.

freelance.footer: Complete background can be found on my linkedin profile.

header.description:
Passionnate about web technologies, I assure a constant follow up about latest trend and technologies to insure a complet accompaniment for your project.

In parallel to my personal goals of starting independent projects, I want to dedicate some of my time to freelance experiences, to solve various problems and meet new teams. Beyond a simple service, I offer an active participation to help you achieve your goals.

My profile allows me to propose a complete service as for the creation of a website or a web application, or as integrating an existing team in support of a specific issue.
header.title: Full stack, Senior Front-end

location.description: Currently on a nomadic lifestyle, I can only accept remote assignments but always arrange to visit the company on site to meet in person.
location.title: Location

pricing.description: Aiming for a better collaboration, I only charge my work on a time-based term, as sprints.
